job description:
Our client continues to invest in data science and analytics by creating two additional roles. This team leverages AI and Machine Learning to identify problem solving opportunities throughout the organization. Primary responsibilities include the following:

Data modeling, product development, data mining, data storage
Support various experiments and formulation of new hypotheses
Hands on involvement in research and development
Contribute to white papers and ad hoc analysis
Qualified candidates will have the following backgrounds:

1-2 years of experience with AI/ML
Strong working knowledge of Python or R and SQL
Experience working with big data and Azure
TensorFlow highly preferred

Machine Learning
